intro: Stellarioides umgenensis, commonly known as the Umgeni starwort, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae, which includes many flowering plants with showy flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, sandy soils and is often found in coastal areas. Its leaves are opposite and linear, while its flowers are small and clustered in racemes. It plays a role in local ecosystems by providing habitat and nectar for pollinators.
